node.title: The Proud Boys and Oath Keepers have been subpoenaed over the US Capitol Riot. Here's what we know so far
node.alt: Proud Boys march across the Hawthorne Bridge in Portland
node.description: A committee investigating the deadly US Capitol riot issuesÂ five subpoenas to far-right extremist groups that have backed former president Donald Trump.
node.content:
["A committee investigating\u00a0the deadly US Capitol riot has issued five subpoenas\u00a0to far-right extremist groups that have backed former president Donald Trump and to individuals associated with those groups", "The Select Committee is seeking testimony from the\u00a0Proud\u00a0Boys and its chairman, Henry \"Enrique\" Tarrio, alongside the Oath Keepers and its president, Elmer Stewart Rhodes.", "The committee has also subpoenaed Robert Patrick Lewis, the chairman of 1st Amendment Praetorian, a lower-profile organisation known for wearing black shirts and providing security at pro-Trump events.", "", "
The Select Committee is seeking testimony from Proud Boys chairman, Henry \"Enrique\" Tarrio.(AP:\u00a0Allison Dinner)
", "
Hang on, who are these people and why does the committee\u00a0want to speak to them?
", "The Proud Boys have been named by United States security agencies as playing a pivotal role in the January attack on the US Capitol,\u00a0and at least 34 individuals associated with the group have been indicted over it.", "Founded in 2016 in response to concerns over political correctness and perceived constraints on masculinity, the group has since been declared a \"terrorist entity\" in Canada for openly\u00a0encouraging \"violent activities against those they perceive to be opposed to their ideology and political beliefs\".", "According to the US Center for Strategic and International Studies, the Oath Keepers are an \"anti-government, right-wing political organisation committed to supporting and defending their interpretation of the US\u00a0Constitution against all enemies, both foreign and domestic\".", "A federal grand jury has indicted 18 members of their group for allegedly planning a coordinated attack to storm the Capitol, including by travelling to Washington with paramilitary gear and supplies.", "The 1st Amendment Praetorian group, meanwhile, call themselves a \"volunteer force of military, law enforcement [and] intel agency community professionals standing up to protest the 1st Amendment\".", "", "
At least 34 individuals associated with the Proud Boys have been indicted over the January attack.(AP: Jacquelyn Martin)
", "Authorities say they provided security at multiple rallies leading up to the January attack, amplifying Donald Trump's unsupported claim that his defeat by Joe Biden was the result of fraud.", "The committee said its chairman Mr Lewis tweeted on January 6: \"Today is the day that true battles begin.\"", "", "
The Oath Keepers are an \"anti-government, right-wing political organisation committed to supporting and defending their interpretation of the US Constitution\".(Reuters:\u00a0Jim Bourg)
", "
Do they have to testify?
", "The committee has ordered the groups and individuals subpoenaed to produce documents and appear for testimony by mid-December.", "Under US law, if you're subpoenaed, you must legally oblige or face being held in contempt.", "The groups and individuals sent the subpoenas did not respond or could not be reached for requests for comment.", "
Who else has been subpoenaed?\u00a0
", "The panel has now issued more than three dozen subpoenas and received testimony from more than 200 witnesses.", "Earlier this week, it issued subpoenas to Alex Jones, founder of the right-wing website Infowars, and Roger Stone, an ally of former President Donald Trump.", "", "
The committee has issued subpoenas to Donald Trump's ally Roger Stone and conspiracy theorist Alex Jones.\u00a0(AP: Julio Cortez /\u00a0Reuters: Jim Bourg)
", "Mr Stone said in a statement he had not yet seen the subpoena, adding: \"I had no advance knowledge of the events that took place at the Capitol on that day.\"", "The committee has also issued subpoenas seeking documents and testimony from Dustin Stockton, a political activist linked to longtime Trump adviser Steve Bannon, and Mr Stockton's fiancee, Jennifer Lawrence.", "Mr Stockton and Ms Lawrence were members of the group We Build the Wall, which was raided by federal agents in August 2020 as part of a fraud investigation.", "In a joint statement, the couple accused the committee of \"not acting in good faith\", but said they remain \"committed to transparency\".\u00a0", "It also issued a subpoena to Taylor Budowich, a spokesman for Mr Trump.", "ABC/Reuters"]
